name: Floating Down the Life
description:
This is the first game I developed during July 2021 in the NUS Soc Summer Workshop.

Floating Down the Life contains more than 20 characters. Each one has different stories. Through the conversation, some characters may give you some gifts as collection, while others may allow you to make a selection. Different selection may trigger different event, which may lead to different endings. In addition, you may meet some characters multiple times, and they will bring different selection. So, try to talk to them and listen to many interesting stories. Also they will contribute Jimmy to remember his past.

Endless(?) Game
  • Balloons are Jimmy's life, with more balloons in his hand, Jimmy floats down slower
  • Avoid obstacles, they will let Jimmy lose his balloon
  • Maybe, this game has an ending?
Talk to the character
  • When Jimmy gets close to the character, presses [Enter] to talk with them
  • Each conversation is different
  • Characters may give you gift, balloon, allow you to make choice, etc.
  • You may meet some characters multiple times with different conversation
  • Through the conversation Jimmy may gradually remember who is he...
Check Collection
  • There are a lot of collections inside the game
  • Check them after finishing the game~
